column4: Mexico says Microsoft plans major investment in Mexico
column5: MEXICO CITY Microsoft Corp has pledged to invest around $1 billion in Mexico between this year and 2018 to promote education and access to information technology in the country  the Mexican government said.

column4: Mexico says Microsoft plans major investment in Mexico
column5: MEXICO CITY  Oct 2 Microsoft Corp has pledged to invest around $1 billion in Mexico between this year and 2018 to promote education and access to information technology in the country  the Mexican government said.

column4: Tesla’s Musk says sedan sales strong tied to SUV launch event
column5: NEW YORK Tesla Motors Inc  saw strong orders of its Model S sedan tied to the launch of its sports utility vehicle  relieving some concerns that the larger car might siphon away sales  Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said on Friday.
